messages.subject: Reverence for Wood
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Sandra, Check out www.half.com.  They have a copy of this for $9.22 and another for $10.10.  Shipping adds a few bucks, but most of the vendors here send by
messages.messageBody:
Hi Sandra,

Check out www.half.com. They have a copy of this for $9.22 and another
for $10.10. Shipping adds a few bucks, but most of the vendors here
send by media mail and it's usually only between $2 and $4. I've bought
from folks on this site around a dozen times and have never had any
problem.

Tawni

___________________-

PROBLEM:

Very expensive.

$15 and $20 used with loose pages, $30 and $45 used in paperback without


loose pages (but how long before that 1970 glue dries up? <g>)

Amazon had what I HOPE is a typo--they're taking orders for a new
edition,

$15 or so (I forget numbers; sorry), and they say December 2012 but I'm

hoping they really meant December 2002.

If so, I can wait two months! <g>

Sandra



Tawni J. Sherman
Snell & Wilmer, L.L.P.
15 W. South Temple, Suite 1200
Salt Lake City, Utah 84101
